ResourceHeader.ResourceName: NASA THEMIS GBO Fort Simpson Station
ResourceHeader.Description: Fort Simpson (FSIM) Station is located in Fort Simpson,Northwest Territories, Canada. FSIM is part of the University of Alberta CARISMA network. Magnetic Latitude: 67.8 Magnetic Longitude: 291.70 UT of Magnetic Midnight: 8.9500 Magnetic Declination: 23.09 Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the CCGM online program with IGRF 2008 at altitude of 0 km. Magnetic declination obtained using CCGM online program with IGRF 2007
